abstract: Seth Schiesel Critic's Notebook describes scene at closing-night party of BlizzCon, annual convention put on by video game company Blizzard Entertainment; says that atmosphere was marked by genuine sense of camaraderie and friendship among fans.
snippet: The most important moment at the BlizzCon convention was not in games of StarCraft II or the closing concert by the Foo Fighters; it came from the fans themselves.
lead_paragraph: The most important moment at the BlizzCon convention was not in games of StarCraft II or the closing concert by the Foo Fighters; it came from the fans themselves.

headline.main: Best Friends, in Fantasy and Reality
headline.print_headline: Best Friends, In Fantasy And Reality
